Articles.Content:
Earlier this month a save was started that would be passed around and I decided to join it. I was away for a while and I haven't looked through the entire thread I think I'm the only one to have made a video on it so far. I plan on recording my turns and uploading them and posting them here but if anyone else has videos from the project they are free to post them. You can read about and join the save here:[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112384-%28Turn-based%29-Kerbal-Multiplayer-Collaboration](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112384-%28Turn-based%29-Kerbal-Multiplayer-Collaboration)

I already uploaded the first video:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/CVJwtrtAxGg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
